pages.text: Silurolepis is primitive placoderm from the Silurian period. Known only from its head shield, it was originally reconstructed like antiarch placoderms. However, a recent study shows that the head shield was anteroposteriorly reversed compared to the original description.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
